character.name: SchoolBoy
character.description: New customer: School boy! Eats a lot, always in a hurry!

character.name: Businessman
character.description: Business manager! He's in a rush, but leaves good tips!

character.name: ProBodybuilder
character.description: Pro athlete! Always hungry and in a hurry for the training!

character.name: FatMan
character.description: Restaurant Chef! Loves tasty burgers and leaves great tips!

character.name: FatLady
character.description: Opera singer! Great tipper and loves to eat! Always in a rush!
